name: Crystal Guides
overview:
Crystal Guides is an online publisher operating various websites since 2000 and offers online adverting solutions for businessâ€™s looking to target their products at online consumers.

The largest web site is UK Net Guide, closely followed by the popular UK Directory site.

The UK Net Guide site aims to educate consumers online by providing clear and helpful information on a range of subjects from Finance, UK Jobs, Travel, Motoring and Lifestyle.

The UK Directory site allows local businesses to list their address and services as well as linking to their social media.

The business is located in the UK in London.
